long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get a daily dose of anti-motivational quotes

Feeling overwhelmed by your daily work? Take a break and enjoy some humorous anti-motivational quotes. Our extension provides daily funny and sarcastic quotes in both English and Chinese to help lighten your day.

Features:
1. Daily Anti-Motivational Quotes: Get a new funny and sarcastic quote every day in either English or Chinese. These quotes are designed to bring a smile to your face and offer a little bit of humor to your busy day.
   
2. Shareable Images: Found a quote you love? Click the share button to generate an image that you can download and share with your friends. Spread the humor!

3. Support the Developer: If you appreciate the lightheartedness this extension brings, feel free to support the developer by clicking the "Buy Me a Coffee" button. Your support helps in maintaining and improving this extension.

How to Use:
1. Add the extension to Chrome and pin it to your toolbar for easy access.
2. Click the extension icon to view a new quote. Each click will show a different quote, making it easy to find your favorite one.
